verses.verse: Brethren, <S%G80><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> Be Taken <S%G4301><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> Offence, <S%G3900><s%> Ye, <S%G5210><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spiritual Ones, <S%G4152><s%> Restore <S%G2675><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Such A One <S%G5108><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> A Spirit <S%G4151><s%> , Of Meekness, <S%G4236><s%> Considering <S%G4648><s%> Thyself <S%G4572><s%> Lest <S%G3361><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Be Tempted. <S%G3985><s%>

One Another's <S%G240><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Burdens <S%G922><s%> Bear Ye, <S%G941><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> Fulfil <S%G378><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> For If <S%G1063><s%> Thinks <S%G1380><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> To Be <S%G1511><s%> Something, <S%G5100><s%> Nothing <S%G3367><s%> Being, <S%G5607><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> He Deceives : <S%G5422><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Work <S%G2041><s%> Of Himself <S%G1438><s%> Let Prove <S%G1381><s%> Each, <S%G1538><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Then <S%G5119><s%> As To <S%G1519><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> Alone <S%G3441><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Boasting <S%G2745><s%> He Will Have, <S%G2192><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> As To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Another. <S%G2087><s%>
<S%G1538><s%> For Each <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588><s%> His Own <S%G2398><s%> Load <S%G5413><s%> Shall Bear. <S%G941><s%>

<S%G2841><s%> Let Share <S%G1161><s%> Him <S%G3588><s%> Being Taught In <S%G2727><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> With Him That <S%G3588><s%> Teaches <S%G2727><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Good Things. <S%G18><s%>

<S%G3361><s%> Be Not Mislead; <S%G4105><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Is Mocked; <S%G3456><s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1063><s%> For Whatsoever <S%G1437><s%> May Sow <S%G4687><s%> A Man, <S%G444><s%> That <S%G5124><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> He Shall Reap. <S%G2325><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Sows <S%G4687><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4561><s%> His Own Flesh, <S%G1438><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Flesh <S%G4561><s%> Shall Reap <S%G2325><s%> Corruption; <S%G5356><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But He That <S%G1161><s%> Sows <S%G4687><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Shall Reap <S%G2325><s%> Life <S%G2222><s%> Eternal : <S%G166><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But In <S%G1161><s%> Well <S%G2570><s%> Doing <S%G4160><s%> <S%G3361><s%> We Should Not Lose Heart; <S%G1573><s%> <S%G2540><s%> For In Time <S%G1063><s%> Due <S%G2398><s%> We Shall Reap <S%G2325><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Fainting. <S%G1590><s%>

So <S%G686><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Occasion <S%G2540><s%> We Have <S%G2192><s%> We Should Work <S%G2038><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Good <S%G18><s%> Towards <S%G4314><s%> All, <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3122><s%> And Specially <S%G1161><s%> Towards <S%G4314><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Of The Household <S%G3609><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Faith. <S%G4102><s%>
See <S%G1492><s%> In How Large <S%G4080><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> Letters <S%G1121><s%> I Wrote <S%G1125><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1699><s%> With My Own Hand. <S%G5495><s%>

As Many As <S%G3745><s%> Wish <S%G2309><s%> To Have A Fair Appearance <S%G2146><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Flesh, <S%G4561><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> Compel <S%G315><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> To Be Circumcised, <S%G4059><s%> Only <S%G3440><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> For The <S%G3588><s%> Cross <S%G4716><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> They May Be Persecuted. <S%G1377><s%>

<S%G3761><s%> For Neither <S%G1063><s%> They Who <S%G3588><s%> Are Being Circumcised <S%G4059><s%> Themselves The <S%G846><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> Keep; <S%G5442><s%> But <S%G235><s%> They Wish <S%G2309><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> To Be Circumcised, <S%G4059><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5212><s%> Your Flesh <S%G4561><s%> They Might Boast. <S%G2744><s%>

<S%G1698><s%> But For Me <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3361><s%> May It Not Be <S%G1096><s%> To Boast <S%G2744><s%> <S%G1487><s%> Except <S%G3361><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Cross <S%G4716><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Of Our Lord <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ; <S%G5547><s%> ' Through <S%G1223><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> To Me The <S%G1698><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> Has Been Crucified, <S%G4717><s%> And I 2504 P-1NS-C To The 3588 T-DSM World. 2889 N-DSM

In <S%G1722><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Neither <S%G3777><s%> Circumcision <S%G4061><s%> Any <S%G5100><s%> , Is Of Force, <S%G2480><s%> Nor <S%G3777><s%> Uncircumcision; <S%G203><s%> But <S%G235><s%> A New <S%G2537><s%> Creation. <S%G2937><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> As Many As <S%G3745><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2583><s%> By This Rule <S%G5129><s%> Shall Walk, <S%G4748><s%> Peace Be <S%G1515><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Mercy, <S%G1656><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Israel <S%G2474><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> For The Rest, <S%G3064><s%> Troubles <S%G2873><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> No One <S%G3367><s%> Let Give, <S%G3930><s%> <S%G1473><s%> For I 1063 CONJ The 3588 T-APN Brands 4742 N-APN Of The 3588 T-GSM Lord 2962 N-GSM Jesus 2424 N-GSM In 1722 PREP 3588 T-DSN 4983 N-DSN My Body 3450 P-1GS Bear. 941 V-PAI-1S

The <S%G3588><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Of Our Lord <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ Be <S%G5547><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Your, <S%G5216><s%> Brethren. <S%G80><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%> To The <S%G4314><s%> Galatians <S%G1052><s%> Written <S%G1125><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Rome. <S%G4516><s%>
